i1.name: Ki Barrier
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After completing an [[champion ability|ability's]] effects, '''Shen''' {{tip|shields}} himself for {{pp|60 to 111}} {{as|(+ 14% '''bonus''' health)}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one {{tip|champion}}, ''Ki Barrier's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{pp|4;4.5;5;5.5;6;6.5;7;7.5|1;6;9;12;14;16;17;18}} seconds.
'''Shen's''' power manifests as a {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} that he can control with his abilities.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: After completing an champion ability effects, Shen shields himself for 60undefined − 111undefined (based on level) (+ 14% bonus health) for 2.5 seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one champion, Ki Barrier's cooldown is reduced by 1;6;9;12;14;16;17;18 ‒ undefined seconds.
Shen's power manifests as a Spirit Blade that he can control with his abilities.
i1.notes:
* The {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} spawns with '''Shen''', teleports closer to him if he gets too far away, and instantly blinks to him if he uses any global {{tip|blink}} ({{si|Teleport}}, {{si|Recall}}, {{ai|Abyssal Voyage|Tahm Kench}}, or {{ai|Stand United|Shen}}). It will also dissappear if '''Shen''' dies and reappear upon [[death|respawning]].
* Enemies see an arrow pointing from '''Shen''' to the location of his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} even if it is not visible.
* {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}} will grant the shield if the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} reaches '''Shen'''. If it is stopped, no shield is granted.
* {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} will give the shield after the protective zone disappears.
* {{ai|Shadow Dash|Shen}} will give the shield when the dash ends.
** If the dash is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, the shield will instead be received the moment the {{tip|crowd control}} source is applied, before damage calculation (if any).

w1.name: Spirit's Refuge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' primes his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}}, creating an area around it. If '''Shen''' or an allied champion enter or are within the area, or after 2 seconds, the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} creates a protective zone around it for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, {{tip|block|blocking}} all non-{{tip|turret}} [[basic attack]]s that hit '''Shen''' or allied champions in the area.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Shen primes his Spirit Blade, creating an area around it. If Shen or an allied champion enter or are within the area, or after 2 seconds, the Spirit Blade creates a protective zone around it for 1.75 seconds, blocking all non-turret basic attacks that hit Shen or allied champions in the area.
w1.notes:
* ''Spirit's Refuge's'' protective zone can be moved while active if '''Shen''' uses {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}}.
* ''Spirit's Refuge'' cannot be ranked up at [[Experience (champion)|Level]] 1.
* ''Spirit's Refuge'' will also block damage from all abilities that use {{tip|basic damage}} ({{ai|Lunge|Fiora}}, {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}, {{ai|Steel Tempest|Yasuo}}).
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|18 to 12}}|Starts after the duration ends}}' as '18/16.5/15/13.5/12' and riot's value '18,16.5,15,13.5,11' as '18/16.5/15/13.5/11'

e1.name: Shadow Dash
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Dealing damage with {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}} or ''Shadow Dash'' restores {{sti|energy|{{as|{{pp|30 to 40 for 3|1;4;12}} energy}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemy champions and {{tip|monsters}} in his path and {{tip|taunt|taunting}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Dealing damage with Twilight Assault or Shadow Dash restores 1;4;12 ‒ undefined energy.
Active: Shen dashes to the target location, dealing physical damage to all enemy champions and monsters in his path and taunting them for 1.5 seconds.
e1.notes:
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Shadow Dash'' will end the dash prematurely, but the end-of-dash collision check will hit enemies at the [[blink|blink's]] location still.
** This still cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
* The energy restore from ''Shadow Dash'' may only occur once.
